reviews.review: Топовая игра
Rankınız düşükse ve tek kişiyseniz allah yardımcınız olsun.
Всем привет, сейчас я расскажу почему эта игра стоит этох денег. В этой игре очень хорошая графика и реализация. Сдесь сбалансированны все персонажи. Эта игра продуманна до мелочей, всем советую!!

Dopo quasi 200 ore posso dire che questo gioco a dei pro e dei contro:
-Ci si diverte con gli amici a fare delle partite in privata 
-Si possono fare delle belle azioni in gioco 
-Far quittare i killer <3 
poi naturalmente i contro sono che:
-I killer alemeno in 2/3 partite vieni sicuramente tunnelato o camperato perche il kiler rosicano 
-Crash molto frequenti 
-Moltissimi bug 
pero detto questo io consiglio vivamente di comprare dbd perche si possono fare nuove amicizie e divertirsi con amici!
Jogo extremamente divertido, principalmente com amigo. Seja um sobrevivente ou algum killer, escape ou mate. A ambientação é boa. Recomendo :3

Раньше игра была очень сырая. Но сейчас разработчики  сделали игру играбильной . В плане баланса  игра 8/10. Сейчас играет прокачка персонажа, раньше не зависело  какой у тебя персонаж и какая у тебя прокачка а сейчас это важный элемент в игре. Так что в принципе игра хороша если не упоминать  былые баги. Рекомендую тем кто любит поиграть с друзьями в выживание и тем кто любит играть за маньяка.
Играйте в эту игру со своей девушкой.

So basically 2k hours... you can get addicted to this game really easily.

DBD has been out for almost 4 years now and if you were to compare the launch of the game to now its is very very different. back then dbd was considered an indie game because the player base/ fan base was only a hand full of people, the game was simple and had many bugs. Compared to now the only similar thing is all of the bugs that are in the game, the player base/ fan base has became a huge sea of toxicity (note: there was toxic people back then as well but not as much) and no one can agree on things because a majority of killer mains and survivor mains hate each other because of the toxic people that ruin the fun for people.

The game is really ♥♥♥♥ing chaotic sometimes and trust me, you'll get mad sometimes or frequently depending on how you like to play.

Right now 2 of the most controversial topics of the game is hitboxes and balancing issues. The reason hitboxes are one is because of the fact that dedicated servers was nice to add but made what the killer sees and the survivor sees different so whenever the killer hits someone its looks like it did hit for them, but for the survivor it was way off and was no where close to hitting them, or both the killer and survivor can plainly see that it wouldnt hit but does anyways (mostly at pallets or windows). The other topic which is balancing issues, usually gets out of hand because not everyone agrees on the same things, but it is expected for a game with a huge player base/ fan base.

One last thing is the wait time for a lobby as a survivor compared to the killer atm, it could be changed in the future at any time but right now survivor wait times are around 5-10 minutes while killers are about 1-10 seconds, which is really far from each other, also there is a chance for a survivor or killer to get kicked out of the game (or they just dc because of something the dont like) and is basically a complete waste of time leaving the survivor to wait another 5-10 minutes which is ridiculous.

Overall these are just some things in the game, you dont have to agree with my opinion and I'm not stopping anyone from playing, just trying to warn anyone before playing to know what is happening.

[h1][u] Dead by Daylight Review [/u][/h1]

[b] [Last edited 1/15/21] [/b]

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4 vs 1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

Now this game has by far one the most toxic communities I have ever seen in any game on the internet, the possibly worst and shameless Developers and most bugged and glitched out game I've played in a very long time.
DbD is a very Survivor-biased and unbalanced game, as I'll explain further in this Review.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

[b][u]1)[/u][/b] 'Behaviour', the game's developers are nothing but greedy for money by regularily releasing Killer and Survivor 'cosmetics' and 'skins' to pay for with real money, as opposed of focusing on fixing this game's real problems such as, in my opinion, the main issue in this game, the massive imbalance between Survivors and Killers. Within every update or 'bug fix', a minimum of 10 more bugs and glitches are expected to be included. There are compilations on YouTube that literally only consist of dozens and dozens of bugs and glitches, graphical as well as gameplay regarding. Whether it's the hitbox that's just totally out of this world or a graphical error. The developers, I'm sure, are very well aware of the most issues this game brings, yet won't do anything about it. I also feel like there's a huge lack of communication between the developers and the community.
After four years of Dead by Daylight being released, nothing new and innovative was implemented ever since. Since June 2016 you still stick your hands in generators and hold M1, looping the Killers around pallets, rescuing mates off of a hook. It's just such a daily routine. It's so monotonous, boring and yet the devs still won't bring us something new, game changing, besides an updated UI and new animations no one has ever asked for. And microtransactions, of course.

On the official Dead by Daylight YouTube channel in the video [url=https://youtu.be/c49bZQ3a2UA?t=831] Dev Tapes: Volume 1 [/url] regarding the 4.5.0 PTB, the Game Designer 'Guillaume' happily announced the new animations for Survivors, including an animation for teabagging, to make sure, and I quote, "it still feels satisfying to our players". Basically, the Developers openly admitted supporting the toxicity towards the Killers in their own game.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

[b][u]2)[/u][/b] "Tunneling" is a term used in the Dead by Daylight community, describing the Killer going straight after a freshly unhooked Survivor in order to down (and mostly hook) them again right away. Thus Survivors have a decreased chance of being able to find a safe spot to heal and continue working on their main objective; repairing generators. If you happen to "tunnel", you also get totally bashed with hateful and frustrating comments in the post-game chat, you're most likely being told about your low to non-existing 'skill' as Killer. Based on my own experience, in many Survivors' opinion, you should give the unhooked Survivor a chance and go for somebody else instead. Which I definitely agree with, if there is no acute reason to do so. But sometimes it's just not possible due to the current circumstances of the match, such as four (out of five) generators being already repaired and having low chances of completing your Killer objective, which is, obviously sacraficing/killing Survivors. No Killer wants to miss the oppertunity of getting a safe kill if there is one. Going for a different Survivor in this case would take away a lot of the Killer's momentum and ruin the chance of sacraficing that one specific or even any Survivor at all. As this game is, and always has been, completely Survivor-biased, Killers [u]will[/u] struggle if they face coordinated and experienced Survivors, especially if they happen to be on comms and work together in a Survive-With-Friends (SWF) group.

Of course, when playing as Survivor, you don't want to be 'camped' or 'tunnled' without any obvious or understandable "reason", such as; right when the match begins and you unluckily get downed within the first two minutes with no generators being repaired yet. It often occurs to me too when playing Survivor and this definitely takes away a lot of fun for the Survivors' side. And as you will probably soon notice after your first couple hours: there is a huge problem with the balance between Killer and Survivors.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

[b][u]3)[/u][/b] If you, as Killer, have hooked a Survivor and decide to be present around the area of the hook the Survivor hangs on, the Survivors are going to have a bit of a hard time managing to unhook their mate. Chances are, the hooked Survivor will die on their first (out of two) hooks. Most Survivors don't like that at all and will absolutely bash you with insults in the post game chat, for instance telling you how you're supposed to play Killer the way they imagine you to and what not to do. A lot of Survivors basically have an unwritten rule book each Killer they face must follow, or else, according to those Survivors, these Killers are 'trash', should 'kill themselves' or even way way worse comments that are to be expected after the match. Most Killer mains, like myself, will relate to this.

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

[b][u]4)[/u][/b] Next thing that's really been a problem for a very long time are the queue times. In the morning it's nearly impossible finding a public lobby as Killer. You queue and wait forever. I'm glad to say it's way better than it used to be two years ago or longer. Back then you would wait over an hour or longer to find a match. However, the fact that the queueing doesn't take you an hour to find a lobby anymore doesn't mean the queueing time couldn't be further improved. You still wait 10-20 minutes. Only around and past 2 P.M. you start finding lobbies quicker as Killer, mostly around 1-2 minutes, which is perfectly fine. Why can't it always be like this? Same goes for Survivors. Regardless of wheter you're in a solo queue or with friends, at around 6-7 P.M. and past that time it's nearly impossible, and I'm not exaggerating when I say this, my friends and I wait - just like with Killer in the morning - for over 10 or 20 minutes in order to find a lobby. It can be really upsetting when you don't have time all night and need to get up early in the morning for work, and barely found any matches. Instead, you spent most time queueing. This should not be a thing. 

════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Now I have by far not covered all points that I would like to mention in this review, such as the hit registration, lag, toxicity in DbD being played down by certain content creators and so much more, as there's only limited space for Reviews anyway, but I hope that anyone who is thinking of buying this pile of garbage gets an idea of what to expect when doing so. And this is just not even a quarter of the problems with this game and its community.

[h1] Conclusion: [/h1]
[u]I do not recommend Dead by Daylight.[/u]

Dead by Daylight is everything but beginner-friendly, you will struggle to find yourself in, whether it's the Killer or Survivor side, Match Making Rating is absolute garbage, meaning you will often get matched with high-tier players on your opposite side, such as Rank 1s, Rank 7s, Rank 12s, etc.. While starting out as a Rank 20 and slowly working your way up, you won't be experienced enough to be facing those ranks yet. However, the developer team doesn't seem to take that problem that seriously, as the problem persists for a very long time.

Like Game Director at Behaviour Digital Inc. Mathieu Coté says: [url=https://youtu.be/qnwdPlx9yR4?t=1804],,go play something else".[/url]

The whole reason I bought this game was because it was something I could play with my husband. Sadly he prefers to play as killer and I am left as the survivor. That being said, it is a very fun game, and quiet addictive! The Devs frequently update and maintain the game as well as coming out with new content on a regular basis (though they could stand to put more cosmetics for certain characters :P).
The only downfall I see to the game is a decent part of the community being very Toxic & Salty after matches.  It causes unneeded drama and fights between killers and survivors.  Besides the toxicity and the occasional crappy playing of some of you team, it is an amazing game! Its a blast when you can solo 3 gens by yourself while your team is either doing who knows what, or being chased. Its amazing when you figure out how to dodge a killer and they lose you in a chase.
And, if you're brand new at the game; the thrill and fear of the unknown killer and their powers is pretty fun too xD 

In summary: This game is well worth the money (including the dlc). I've made plenty of friends on it and will continue to do so! So buckle up and hope that Nurse's Calling & BBQ & Chili won't find you!!  10/10 reccomend this game!

Meh I'm done with this game. It's so ridiculously stacked in favour of the killer survival doesn't become tense it's just a question of how quick you die. The only time it gets tense is if you hear the 'escape' alert. Especially with some killer perks. Perks that show where survivors are for a time if they are near generators, which everyone is because that's the only way to escape. Nearly every map a killer can get to you in that time, so you just have to crouch and hope he doesn't check your corner, but he knows you're in that area so obviously he's going to. You can't outrun, sometimes you can hide if there is a lot of crap around and the killer makes a mistake. Everything you do as a survivor except heal yourself notifies the killers. I've had 15 skill checks repairing a generator. And if the map is inside a building or a built up area there's literally no point in playing survivor. You get stuck on traps or have to run around to find a machine to defuse a trap that you may as well have a neon sign over your head.

游戏是非常棒的游戏，制作组是非常棒的制作组。黎明杀机从2016年7月陪伴我至今，我对它的热爱从未减少过，因为这始终是我接触过的最好的游戏之一，也是我接触过制作组最用心的游戏之一。
至于游戏的内容，其实相当简单：四个带着各式工具（或是空手）的无耻偷电贼偷偷潜伏进农场主的地盘然后悄咪咪偷取五台电机的电来满足自己找完乐子还能逃跑的终极欲望......什么？你问我怎么找乐子？当然是二人转，1212啦！看着农场主从淡定到生气到郁闷到自闭真是太有趣啦！
当然如果你扮演善良的农场主的话角色可能就反过来了......
不建议萌新在教程中学会QTE或是砍人前进入游戏QAQ
另外，最近游戏又双叒叕打折啦！欢迎蠢新们加入鸭！
建议蠢新们购买游戏本体+皮脸DLC+妖巫DLC（可选小白脸DLC+小丑DLC，以及进阶后购买怨灵DLC，虽然总共也就这几个......），服装DLC没必要购买因为商城内的更漂亮A.A（我永远喜欢短裙托马斯！）
强烈建议在购买游戏前先去各大网站看看相关视频以及直播，了解游戏要做的基本操作，免得进游戏坑（bang）队（tu）友（fu）！

Когда все говорили, что убийца ДБД - это пятница 13, ага ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Не могу представить эту игру без багов, это была бы уже параллельная вселенная какая-то. Без багов эта игра не была бы такой фановой и топовой0)) В любой не понятной ситуации: если встречаешь баг - говори "pretty good job so far". 

Вначале этой игры вам может показаться, что это игра - настоящий хоррор, и вы действительно испытываете страх, играя в Dead By Daylight, но... Как же вы ошиблись тогда...

Спустя несколько часов вы уже будете стоять у ворот с супер-пупер фиолетовым фонариком, жукать мана, приседая ему в лицо, и тыкать на него пальцем, мол "Какая же ты лошара, не смог поймать меня!". А за убийцу будете месить сурвов, дергая своей головой возле крюка, на котором они весят(особенно в момент, когда сущность уже забирает сурва). 

Против тебя тима с топовыми фонариками, все с престижом, возможно с осколком(перк decisive strike), а сурвы еще потом с 80% шансом будут тебя жукать в катке? ВКЛЮЧАЕМ ТОКСИК КИЛЛЕРА И БЕРЕМ МЕМЕНТО МОРИ, ГИБЕЛЬ ФРАНКЛИНА, ПОРЧУ НА ГЕНЕРАТОРЫ, И ВПЕРЕД ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) А потом наблюдаем их бомбежку в чате о том, какие мы плохие, что мы токсики, а они святые, и вообще ты не должен был за ними бегать ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Однозначно игра стоит своего времени и денег, вам будет весело(в редких случаях может и не весело, но это пройдет), играя как за мана, так и за сурва, как в соло, так и в пати с друзьями.
